column1: Kata Robata////We walked in here on a Saturday evening
column2: while happy hour was going on. Surprisingly
column3: it wasn't as crowded as I had expected to be
column4: but that might have been because it was early evening and not towards the end of happy hour (which is 4-7 on Mondays-Saturdays
column5: by the way). We were greeted by an angry host and seated at a nice booth table. Our server was attentive
column6: especially since we didn't even realize all the times are water was being filled.
